attributes.action: Revoke Tyler, The Creator's ban from the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The guidelines which stop Tyler, The Creator from entering the UK were introduced in 2005 to stop terrorists from entering the UK. 
Comparatively Tyler, The Creators lyrics are not that explicit when compared with other bands which are free to enter and leave the UK.
attributes.background: Tyler, The Creator is the greatest musician to ever grace the ears of teenagers. He was banned by Theresa May in August 2015, on the grounds that his lyrical content wasn't "acceptable behaviour for the UK".
